SubRecord.Property:
SELECT u.cFirstName, u.cLastName, u.UserEmail, d.cBranchCode, '' as cName1, '' as cLocationType, CAST(c.cLocalCustomerNumber as Numeric) as cLocalCustomerNumber, '' as cBillToSuffix, '' as cShipToSuffix, ls.cName, c.cCompanyCode, mi.MyItems_id, mi.MyItemName, c.nCustomers_id, mil.LegacySKU, mil.ItemDescrip, mil.SelectedUOMQty, mil.SelectedUOM, mil.LineSeqNum, mil.LineLevelCode, B.BrandName, mi.nCustomerLocations_id, pu.UserEmail as PrivateUserEmail, mu.UserEmail as ModifyUserEmail, mu.cFirstName as ModifycFirstName, mu.cLastName as ModifycLastName FROM MyItems mi (nolock) INNER JOIN MyItemLines mil (nolock) on mi.MyItems_id=mil.MyItems_id inner join Customers c (nolock) ON c.Ncustomers_id = mi.nCustomers_id inner JOIN dbo.Customerdivisions cd (nolock) ON c.nCustomers_id = cd.nCustomers_id inner JOIN dbo.Divisions d (nolock) ON cd.nDivisions_id = d.nDivisions_id inner JOIN dbo.LegacySystems ls (nolock) ON d.nLegacySystems_id = ls.nLegacySystems_id inner JOIN dbo.Brands B (NOLOCK) ON D.Brands_Id = B.Brands_Id left outer JOIN Users u (nolock) ON mi.CreationUsers_id=u.nUsers_id left outer JOIN Users pu (nolock) ON mi.nUsers_id=pu.nUsers_id left outer JOIN Users mu (nolock) ON mi.UpdatedBy=mu.nUsers_id WHERE c.ldeleted = 0 and mil.legacysku <> 'SPECIAL' and ls.cName = 'MAX' and mi.nCustomers_id is not null and C.cLocalCustomerNumber not in ('CL','00X8412447','3051284-00', 'x') and mi.cNG_datamigration_Flag <> 'M' and ( '#Extract_Type#' = 'F' OR ('#Extract_Type#' = 'C' and c.Ncustomers_id in (select nCustomers_id from CustomerXref_NextGen (NoLock))) )
UNION ALL
SELECT u.cFirstName, u.cLastName, u.UserEmail, d.cBranchCode, cl.cName as cName1, cl.cLocationType, CAST(cl.cLocalCustomerNumber as Numeric) as cLocalCustomerNumber, cl.cBillToSuffix, cl.cShipToSuffix, ls.cName, cl.cCompanyCode, mi.MyItems_id, mi.MyItemName, cl.nCustomers_id, mil.LegacySKU, mil.ItemDescrip, mil.SelectedUOMQty, mil.SelectedUOM, mil.LineSeqNum, mil.LineLevelCode, B.BrandName, mi.nCustomerLocations_id, pu.UserEmail as PrivateUserEmail, mu.UserEmail as ModifyUserEmail, mu.cFirstName as ModifycFirstName, mu.cLastName as ModifycLastName FROM MyItems mi (nolock) INNER JOIN MyItemLines mil (nolock) on mi.MyItems_id=mil.MyItems_id INNER JOIN CustomerLocations cl (nolock) ON mi.nCustomerlocations_id=cl.nCustomerlocations_id inner join Customers c (nolock) ON c.Ncustomers_id = cl.nCustomers_id inner JOIN dbo.CustomerLocationDivisions cld (nolock) ON cl.nCustomerLocations_id = cld.nCustomerLocations_id inner JOIN dbo.Divisions d (nolock) ON cld.nDivisions_id = d.nDivisions_id inner JOIN dbo.LegacySystems ls (nolock) ON d.nLegacySystems_id = ls.nLegacySystems_id inner JOIN dbo.Brands B (NOLOCK) ON D.Brands_Id = B.Brands_Id left outer JOIN Users u (nolock) ON mi.CreationUsers_id=u.nUsers_id left outer JOIN Users pu (nolock) ON mi.nUsers_id=pu.nUsers_id left outer JOIN Users mu (nolock) ON mi.UpdatedBy=mu.nUsers_id WHERE c.ldeleted = 0 and cl.ldeleted = 0 and mil.legacysku <> 'SPECIAL' and ls.cName = 'MAX' and mi.nCustomerLocations_id is not null and C.cLocalCustomerNumber not in ('CL','00X8412447','3051284-00', 'x') and mi.cNG_datamigration_Flag <> 'M' and ( '#Extract_Type#' = 'F' OR ('#Extract_Type#' = 'C' and c.Ncustomers_id in (select nCustomers_id from CustomerXref_NextGen (NoLock))) ) order by c.nCustomers_id, mi.nCustomerLocations_id, mi.MyItems_id
tsort -key nCustomers_id -asc -nulls first -key nCustomerLocations_id -asc -nulls first -key MyItems_id -asc
